system.requirements: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Runtz
system.effect:
After making a Roll on the 'Eadbang Table, the Character can spend a Fate Point to immediately kill a single Gretchin, Squig, or Snotling that they have gained via the Runtz Talent. In doing so, they do not suffer the rolled result of the 'Eadbang Table.
The creature detonates in a shower of gore and green sparks.

description.value: After making a Roll on the 'Eadbang Table, the Character can spend a Fate Point to immediately kill a single Gretchin, Squig, or Snotling that they have gained via the Runtz Talent. In doing so, they do not suffer the rolled result of the 'Eadbang Table. The creature detonates in a shower of gore and green sparks.
